tabularpricepane_list.name: Tabular Price Pane
tabularpricepane_list.description: Tabular Price Pane Widget for Magento.

widget_title.label: Widget title
widget_title.description: Set the title for widget heading. You can also hide it by "Hide widget title?" field selection to "Yes" on this form.

price_from.label: Price from
price_from.description: Add the integer value for starting the price tab filter.

price_to.label: Price to
price_to.description: Add the integer value for ending the price tab filter or Enter the '0'(zero) value to auto calculate it's value as maximum of store price.

price_difference.label: Price difference
price_difference.description: Add the integer value to divide the From and To values in the specified difference or Enter the '0'(zero) value to auto calculate it's value like (priceDifference = priceTo - priceFrom).

cat_path.label: Default category
cat_path.description: Select any category as default to load the products on first priority.

number_of_product_display.label: Number of products to display
number_of_product_display.description: Add the integer value to load default number of products on price tab clicking.

price_text_color.label: Product price text color
price_text_color.description: Add color code or color name for product price.

title_text_color.label: Product title text color
title_text_color.description: Add color code or color name for product title name.

price_tab_text_color.label: From - To price tab text color
price_tab_text_color.description: Add color code or color name for (From - To) price tab text.

price_tab_background_color.label: From - To price tab background color
price_tab_background_color.description: Add color code or color name for (From - To) price tab background.

header_text_color.label: Widget title text color
header_text_color.description: Add color code or color name for widget heading title.

header_background_color.label: Widget title background color
header_background_color.description: Add color code or color name for widget heading background.

tp_widget_width.label: Widget Width
tp_widget_width.description: Add width of widget in pixel or percentage. Default width is 100%

display_title_price_over_image.label: Display title and price over image?
display_title_price_over_image.description: Select "Yes" to hide title and price with add to cart button below of product image and display over product image when product image mouse hover. Default is "No" to display it below product image.

hide_widget_title.label: Hide widget title?
hide_widget_title.description: Select "Yes" to hide widget heading. Default is "No" to display it.

hide_searchbox.label: Hide search textbox?
hide_searchbox.description: Select "Yes" to hide search textbox field. Default is "No" to display it.

hide_categorybox.label: Hide category dropdown?
hide_categorybox.description: Select "Yes" to hide category dropdown field. Default is "No" to display it.

hide_product_title.label: Hide product title?
hide_product_title.description: Select "Yes" to hide the product title. Default is "No" to display it.

hide_product_price.label: Hide product price?
hide_product_price.description: Select "Yes" to hide the product price. Default is "No" to display it.
